publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3160.1 Nicola Sturgeon: Implementing the Cancer Strategy-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3160) in the name of Malcolm Chisholm, leave out from "supports" to end and insert "considers that the staff shortages in cancer services, highlighted in the recent Clinical Standards Board for Scotland reports, restrict the ability of front-line staff to decide investment priorities, lead service change and deliver a first class service for patients, and calls on the Scottish Executive to introduce specific initiatives to tackle these shortages."
